Class MilitaryTheatresStage

java.lang.Object
  stages.MilitaryTheatresStage

public class MilitaryTheatresStage
extends java.lang.Object

This class has one static method. This method will be responsible for dealing with the logic of having state's battle it out. It will decide who wins, and change the losing state's information as necessary.
